# Return TRUE if survey mode is CMP

```r
isCMP(x)

## S4 method for signature 'GPR'
isCMP(x)

isCommonOffset(x)

## S4 method for signature 'GPR'
isCommonOffset(x)

isVelSpectrum(x)

## S4 method for signature 'GPR'
isVelSpectrum(x)

isVelModel(x)

## S4 method for signature 'GPR'
isVelModel(x)
```

## Arguments

- `x`: (`GPR`) An object of the class GPR.

## Returns

(`logical()`) `TRUE` if `x` is of type CMP/WARR

Return TRUE if survey mode is CMP/WARR
